source.ff28969e:
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
data = pd.read_csv('../input/marvelcinematicuniverse-01-ironman/MarvelCinematicUniverse_01_IronMan.csv')
print(f"Total Number of Question Answer pairs : {len(data)}")

choices = [np.random.randint(0, len(data)) for i in range(10)]
for i in choices:
    print('\n')
    print(f"Question : {data['Questions'][i]}")
    print(f"Answer   : {data['Answers'][i]}")
source.f0d2ecc2: This dataset has been prepared to help with question answering systems. Questions have been prepared with a good amount of detail covering multiple ways of asking the same question (son / child, with or without the movie name, various names for the same person / entity, etc.). Feel free to comment improvements and I shall work on the same :)
